title: Phytoremediation - plants remove toxins from soil

content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the concept of phytoremediation?

choices.label: The use of plants to absorb and accumulate toxic materials from the soil
The concentration of toxic materials in the tissue of organisms as they move through successive trophic levels
The breaking down of toxic materials in the natural environment by sunlight
The remediation of an ecosystem degraded by human activities back to its original structure and composition
The use of bacteria and other microorganisms to break down hazardous waste

content.answer: The use of plants to absorb and accumulate toxic materials from the soil
